content:
{"name": "Center for Lay Ministries", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Closed anytime Greater Clark County Schools are closed for inclement weather.

Clients must bring this information with them each time they visit: 

-At each visit, clients must have a picture ID, a piece of mail with current address, and proof of the number of people living in their household.
-Clients can visit the food pantry once each month to shop in our food pantry with an assigned volunteer.
-Homeless clients can visit the food pantry once a week and will receive food that doesn’t require cooking.", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "213 East Maple Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Jeffersonville", "state_province": "IN", "postal_code": "47130", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.273976, "longitude": -85.739589}, "phones": [{"number": "(812) 282-0063", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed During Year: Inclement weather"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
